result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian J Knight was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver THC (>200-1000g), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(h)2.
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Dane County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: $518  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Maintain full-time employment/education or combination of or be seeking same, and treatment.

Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with JK, CJK & LWK.
1/26/17: Court orders no contact condition to be amended to say defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with JK, CJK & LWK unless approved by agent in writing.

Completion of certified domestic violence treatment.  Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

timeConds.notes: With huber. Credit does NOT apply.

supervisions.notes: IMPOSED & STAYED. Concur to ct 1.  To be served in WPS pursuant to sec. 973.03(2).

miscConds.notes: $343  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
